descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][font=Verdana][size=6]Redguard Follower Pack[/size][/font]
[size=4][font=Verdana]featuring
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77639/?]Laima[/url] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77717/?]Layia[/url]
[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/c1hwyszd3/20160730221548_1.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5p7d2plon/20160731001250_1.jpg[/img]

[/size][/color][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]These are my same followers just merged together for convenience & one less .esp.[/color]
[/font]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]
[/font][font=Verdana]Name:  Laima (Luck)
Race:  Redguard
Height:  .92
Weight:  80
Body:  Custom UUNP
Marriageable:  Yes
Voice:  Female Sultry
Location:  Dragonsbridge (Four Shields Tavern)
Skin:  Fair Skin
Armor:  1001 Nights
Jewelry:  Various KS Jewelry
Weapons:  Engraved Shamshir & bow with Redguard Shield
Skill bonuses to:  Sneak, block, & One Handed.  Default Combat Style.  Only spell is healing.  Redguard traits/bonuses.

Name:  Layia (Dark Beauty; Born At Night)
Race:  Redguard
Height:  .94
Weight:  86
Body:  Custom UUNP
Marriageable:  Yes
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Location:  Falkreath (Dead Man's Drink)
Skin:  Demonic
Armor:  Steel Nord Plate Bikini Armor
Weapon:  Ebony with CL Weapon Replacer
Skill bonuses to:  Sneak, block, & One Handed.  Default Combat Style.  Only spell is healing.  Redguard traits/bonuses.

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF.

[/font][b][size=3]*1.1 - Added Optional .esp if you want Sneak Perks for both followers*[/size][/b]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3yoc1845j/20160730221222_1.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/dkhwhivbb/20160731000138_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]

[font=Verdana]HDT Compatible Skeleton ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url] Recommended)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url] (Body & Armor)[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[/font]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Laima's feet sometime sink through the ground due to the armor.  Giving her a different armor fixes this issue.

If you have the individual followers downloaded; it is highly recommended to uninstall before installing the pack.[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]

[font=Verdana]Manual or your favorite mod manager.[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]

Manual removal of all Redgard Follower Pack files or your favorite mod manager.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cuuirf5dz/Many+Thanks To.png[/img]
